author: trawick
msg: apr_memcache_server_create(): Fix handling of the ttl parameter.
It is documented as a number of seconds but was treated as
microseconds.
(The current Subversion release passes seconds.)
Submitted by: Tim Whittington <timw apache.org>
Reviewed by: trawick

author: mduerig
msg: OAK-197: oak-api ConflictHandler defines method using oak.spi.state.NodeState
move conflict handler from method parameter to plugin

author: stefan2
msg: Fix a pool usage issue: make sure that the 1st level DAG node cache lives
as long as the corresponding FS pool.  Only then will all cleanups be
performed before the cache address becomes invalid.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/caching.c
(svn_fs_fs__initialize_caches): create the cache directly in the FS pool
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/tree.c
(fs_fs_dag_cache_t): update docstring
(svn_fs_fs__create_dag_cache): create the sub-pool for nodes only
(auto_clear_dag_cache): keep the cache object itself; clear contents only
(dag_node_cache_get): update caller
